wikipedia_page.main: Sir Simon Fraser Campbell,  (born 27 March 1941) is a British chemist.

response: * Sir Simon Campbell, CBE, FRS, FMedSci, International Director of Research Pfizer, Signatory to patent of Viagra; Past President of the Royal Society of Chemistry; Visiting Professor at the Universities of Bristol and São Paulo, board of advisors Universities of Leeds and Kent; Consultant FAO
